Articles.Content: I ended up taking a space station contract that required me to staff two tourists to fulfill the contract. They were not available as I built the station nor were they available later after all other contract requirements were met. (I had figured they might show for transfer. Something I am missing or a game bug?
Does that not mean that you need to take a "tourist" contract too, then send them to the space station on their way to whatever destination they actually want?

2 hours ago, Plusck said:

Does that not mean that you need to take a "tourist" contract too, then send them to the space station on their way to whatever destination they actually want?

The problem is, I do not have a tourist contract available.
What Plusck said.  The only way to get tourists is to accept one of those "take N tourists to their destinations" contracts.
